company.name: IT Sector
company.description: IT Sector is a company with more than 15 years specialized in digital transformation for financial institutions around Europe.

experienceDescription: Developing new features as described on analysis requirement on microservices backend solution using .Net C# (.Net Core, .Net Framework).
Working close to customer’s team in Canada and mobile team to identify and fix bugs on backend solution as it was open from QA and QA customer’s team.
Helping and leading new members on team to understand the architecture and start to develop new features based on user stories in backend project.

company.name: Oreons IT Solutions
company.description: Oreons IT Solutions is a company with more than 20 years of IT experience for the airline and transport business market.

experienceDescription: Developed new features as described on daily meetings with customer and tech leads on company’s back office, front office, totem, and ecommerce solutions using .Net C# (.Net Core, .Net Framework), Entity Framework, Angular.
Worked as principal mobile developer fixing bugs and developing new features as described on daily meetings with customer and tech leads using React Native and Ionic.
Worked close to support and QA team to identify and fix bugs on company’s backend, frontend, and mobile app solution.

company.name: Nova Singular

educations.degree: B.Sc. in Analysis and System Development
